sentences.en: At a very young age , Lia Gablishvili, from Georgia , already knew many stories about China.
sentences.cn: 很小的时候就知道很多关于中国的故事.

sentences.en: Hamilton , who was aback a minute, responded by explaining that Lia had been adopted from China.
sentences.cn: 汉密尔顿吃惊地愣了一会儿, 解释到:莉尔是从中国收养的.

sentences.en: Objective To study in vitro growth inhibitory effect of LIA on bacteria.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨女贞子体外抑菌作用.

sentences.en: Sadly, the odds remain heavily against Athens following Bras í lia.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 希腊效仿巴西的可能性不大.
